cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's saifu

sentence.kanji: 会社に財布を忘れた。
sentence.romaji: kaisha ni saifu wo wasureta
sentence.english: I left my wallet at the office.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's gyuunyuu

sentence.kanji: 私は毎朝、牛乳を飲む。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha maiasa gyuunyuu wo nomu
sentence.english: I drink milk every morning.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kakaru

sentence.kanji: 壁に大きな時計が掛かっています。
sentence.romaji: kabe ni ooki na tokei ga kakate imasu
sentence.english: There's a big clock hanging on the wall.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hakushu

sentence.kanji: 大きな拍手が上がった。
sentence.romaji: ooki na hakushu ga agata
sentence.english: There was a big round of applause.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sabishii

sentence.kanji: これは寂しい曲ですね。
sentence.romaji: kore ha sabishii kyoku desu ne
sentence.english: This is a sad song.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kega

sentence.kanji: 彼女は腕を怪我した。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha ude wo kegashita
sentence.english: She injured her arm.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's naosu

sentence.kanji: 早く風邪を治してください。
sentence.romaji: hayaku kaze wo naoshite kudasai
sentence.english: I hope your cold gets better soon.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's okoru

sentence.kanji: 彼女が嘘をついたので、彼は怒った。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ga uso wo tsuita no de kare ha okota
sentence.english: He was angry because she lied to him.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's fuku

sentence.kanji: タオルで体を拭きました。
sentence.romaji: taoru de karada wo fukimashita
sentence.english: I dried myself with a towel.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's koukoku

sentence.kanji: その広告を新聞で見ました。
sentence.romaji: sono koukoku wo shinbun de mimashita
sentence.english: I saw that advertisement in the newspaper.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hirogeru

sentence.kanji: 電車の中では新聞を広げないで。
sentence.romaji: densha no naka de ha shinbun wo hirogenai de
sentence.english: Don't spread your newspaper wide open in the train.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's temae

sentence.kanji: 駅の手前に郵便局があります。
sentence.romaji: eki no temae ni yuubinkyoku ga arimasu
sentence.english: There's a post office by the station.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tomo

sentence.kanji: 持つべきものは友よね。
sentence.romaji: motsubeki mono ha tomo yo ne
sentence.english: The important thing to keep is friends.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's uchiawase

sentence.kanji: 午後に打ち合わせをしましょう。
sentence.romaji: gogo ni uchiawase wo shimashou
sentence.english: Let's have a meeting in the afternoon.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ukemotsu

sentence.kanji: 1年生を受け持っています。
sentence.romaji: ichinensei wo ukemote imasu
sentence.english: I am in charge of the first graders.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tegaru

sentence.kanji: 手軽に作れる料理を教えてください。
sentence.romaji: tegaru ni tsukureru ryouri wo oshiete kudasai
sentence.english: Please teach me some easy-to-do dishes.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tehon

sentence.kanji: 手本を見ながら習字をしました。
sentence.romaji: tehon wo minagara shuuji wo shimashita
sentence.english: I practiced calligraphy by looking at examples.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's futan

sentence.kanji: 交通費は個人負担です。
sentence.romaji: koutsuuhi ha kojin futan desu
sentence.english: Transportation costs are covered by the individual.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's housoku

sentence.kanji: 勝利するには法則があるそうだ。
sentence.romaji: shouri suru ni ha housoku ga aru sou da
sentence.english: I heard that there are rules to follow in order to win.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kaikei

sentence.kanji: 会計を済ませて店を出たんだ。
sentence.romaji: kaikei wo sumasete mise wo deta n da
sentence.english: I payed the bill and then left the shop.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shiharau

sentence.kanji: カウンターで料金を支払った。
sentence.romaji: kaunta- de ryoukin wo shiharata
sentence.english: I paid the fee at the counter.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shiharai

sentence.kanji: お支払いはカードもお使いいただけます。
sentence.romaji: oshiharai ha ka-do mo o tsukai itadakemasu
sentence.english: You can also pay by credit card.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's harai

sentence.kanji: 飲み屋の払いがたまっているんだ。
sentence.romaji: nomiya no harai ga tamate iru n da
sentence.english: I'm running up a bar bill.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sasu

sentence.kanji: 時計が12時を指してる。
sentence.romaji: tokei ga juuniji wo sashite ru
sentence.english: The clock points to 12 o'clock.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's koyubi

sentence.kanji: 小指を切ってしまいました。
sentence.romaji: koyubi wo kite shimaimashita
sentence.english: I cut my little finger.

cards.english: aim for, have an eye on
cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mezasu

sentence.kanji: 私は料理人を目指しています。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha ryourinin wo mezashite imasu
sentence.english: I intend becoming a cook.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's uchiawaseru

sentence.kanji: 来週の予定を打ち合わせましょう。
sentence.romaji: raishuu no yotei wo uchiawasemashou
sentence.english: Let's discuss next week's schedule.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shitei

sentence.kanji: 指定された席にお座りください。
sentence.romaji: shitei sareta seki ni o suwari kudasai
sentence.english: Please sit on the designated seat.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kai

sentence.kanji: 会は午後9時に終わりました。
sentence.romaji: kai ha gogo kuji ni owarimashita
sentence.english: The meeting ended at 9:00 pm.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's uketomeru

sentence.kanji: ボールが速過ぎて受け止められなかったの。
sentence.romaji: bo-ru ga haya sugite uketomerare nakata no
sentence.english: The ball was so fast that I couldn't catch it.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kogata

sentence.kanji: 小型のスーツケースを買いました。
sentence.romaji: kogata no su-tsuke-su wo kaimashita
sentence.english: I bought a small suitcase.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kata

sentence.kanji: 新しい型のカメラを買いました。
sentence.romaji: atarashii kata no kamera wo kaimashita
sentence.english: I bought a new-model camera.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sesuru

sentence.kanji: 子供が動物に接するのは良いことです。
sentence.romaji: kodomo ga doubutsu ni sesuru no ha yoi koto desu
sentence.english: It is good for children to have contact with animals.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hajime

sentence.kanji: 私たちの旅は始めはよかったんだ。
sentence.romaji: watashitachi no tabi ha hajime ha yokata n da
sentence.english: The start of our trip was good.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's youshitsu

sentence.kanji: このテーブルは洋室に合わない。
sentence.romaji: kono te-buru ha youshitsu ni awanai
sentence.english: This table is not suited to a Western-style room.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's zaigaku

sentence.kanji: 姉は大学に在学しています。
sentence.romaji: ane ha daigaku ni zaigaku shite imasu
sentence.english: My elder sister studies at university.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kaiin

sentence.kanji: 彼女はクラブの会員です。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha kurabu no kaiin desu
sentence.english: She's a member of the club.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's katsugu

sentence.kanji: 彼は大きな荷物を担いで来たの。
sentence.romaji: kare ha ooki na nimotsu wo katsuide kita no
sentence.english: He came carrying large luggage.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's iikaesu

sentence.kanji: 彼女は負けずに言い返したの。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha makezu ni iikaeshita no
sentence.english: She talked back just as much.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's uchikeshi

sentence.kanji: 彼はうわさを打ち消したわよ。
sentence.romaji: kare ha uwasa wo uchikeshita wa yo
sentence.english: He denied the rumor.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yubisasu

sentence.kanji: みんなが彼の指差す方を見たんだ。
sentence.romaji: minna ga kare no yubisasu hou wo mitanda
sentence.english: Everyone looked in the direction he pointed.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shugi

sentence.kanji: 私は車は持たない主義です。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha kuruma ha motanai shugi desu
sentence.english: I do not have a car on principle.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's giri

sentence.kanji: 彼は義理を大切にしています。
sentence.romaji: kare ha giri wo taisetsu ni shite imasu
sentence.english: He values duty.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's gikai

sentence.kanji: 議会で区の来年の予定が話し合われたんだ。
sentence.romaji: gikai de ku no rainen no yotei ga hanashiawareta n da 。
sentence.english: The council discussed the district's plan for the upcoming year.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's gidai

sentence.kanji: 今日の議題は面白そうです。
sentence.romaji: kyou no gidai ha omoshiro sou desu
sentence.english: Today's agenda looks interesting.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's gakai

sentence.kanji: 彼は学会で論文を発表したよ。
sentence.romaji: kare ha gakai de ronbun wo hapyou shita yo
sentence.english: He presented a paper in an academic conference.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hansuru

sentence.kanji: 彼の行いはモラルに反しています。
sentence.romaji: kare no okonai ha moraru ni hanshite imasu
sentence.english: What he is doing goes against morals.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kaijou

sentence.kanji: 会場は人で一杯になりました。
sentence.romaji: kaijou ha hito de ipai ni narimashita
sentence.english: The hall was filled with people.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's gozonji

sentence.kanji: 彼の名前をご存じですか。
sentence.romaji: kare no namae wo gozonji desu ka
sentence.english: Do you know his name?

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's zonjiru

sentence.kanji: 郵便局はどこかご存じですか。
sentence.romaji: yuubinkyoku ha doko ka gozonji desu ka
sentence.english: Do you know where the post office is?

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's igi

sentence.kanji: この事業には大きな意義があります。
sentence.romaji: kono jigyou ni ha ooki na igi ga arimasu
sentence.english: This project has enormous significance.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's juwaki

sentence.kanji: 受話器を取ってもらえますか。
sentence.romaji: juwaki wo tote moraemasu ka
sentence.english: Could you pick up the receiver?
